content:

content:
Thank you for agreeing to the rental price of 1,500 Euros per month. I appreciate your interest in the apartment and your willingness to sign a long term rental agreement.

As your landlord, I do have a few questions that I would like to ask you in order to ensure that we can have a successful and mutually beneficial rental arrangement.

Firstly, can you provide me with some information about your background and your reasons for moving to New York? This will help me to better understand your needs and expectations as a tenant.

Secondly, can you provide me with some references from previous landlords or roommates? This will give me an idea of your reliability and responsibility as a tenant.

Finally, can you provide me with some information about your financial situation and your ability to pay the rental price on time each month? This will help me to ensure that we can both meet our obligations under the rental agreement.

I hope that you can provide me with this information as soon as possible, so that we can move forward with the lease agreement process.

content:
